concept.title: Media Client Video Display Overview
concept.shortdesc: This document provides an overview of the Media Client Video Display library that is used by the Video Client library in the Multimedia Framework component.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The Media Client Video Display library allows you to display video in a window and to support a graphic surface.

section.title: Media Client Video Display library details
section.p: The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

entry.p: These files are used to implement the display video functionality and support graphics surfaces.
